pediatrics_access_scores:ped_cnt.short_description: Count of pediatricians based on provider locations
pediatrics_access_scores:ped_cnt.long_description: Count of pediatricians based on provider locations. Address data was collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.

pediatrics_access_scores:ped_e2sfca.long_name: Pediatric care access score (2-step enhanced floating catchment areas)
pediatrics_access_scores:ped_e2sfca.short_description: Index of pediatric care physician accessibility based on supply and demand of providers
pediatrics_access_scores:ped_e2sfca.long_description: Pediatric care access score based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of pediatricians per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for pediatricians (population under 16). Provider address data was collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
pediatrics_access_scores:ped_e2sfca.statement: The pediatric care accessibility score for {features.name} is {value}.

pediatrics_access_scores:pediat_e2sfca.long_name: Pediatric care access score (2-step enhanced floating catchment areas)
pediatrics_access_scores:pediat_e2sfca.short_description: Index of pediatric care physician accessibility based on supply and demand of providers
pediatrics_access_scores:pediat_e2sfca.long_description: Pediatric care access score based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of pediatricians per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for pediatricians (population under 16). Provider address data was collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
pediatrics_access_scores:pediat_e2sfca.statement: The pediatric care accessibility score for {features.name} is {value}.
